channel.title: Me, myself and I
channel.description: Recent content on Me, myself and I

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Karin Berg I am currently a mobile and backend developer at Daimler Trucks AG. However, I’m not nailed down to that. I’m open to do whatever is necessary to create useful products. This is my passion and what drives me forward. My strongest skill is my flexibility to switch between the role of a software developer and a coordinator. I try to fill any gap I notice which helps the team to reach the goal.
